channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-1077] Exception in thread "JMX Connector Thread" on startup of jboss-fuse-6.1.0.redhat-311
item.description:
I installed the jboss-fuse-6.1.0.redhat-311 build, edited etc/users.properties, and started up fuse. I got:

kevins-mbp:jboss-fuse-6.1.0.redhat-311 kearls$ ./bin/fuse
Please wait while JBoss Fuse is loading...
34% [========================> ]Exception in thread "JMX Connector Thread [service:jmx:rmi://0.0.0.0:44444/jndi/rmi://0.0.0.0:1099/karaf-root]" java.lang.RuntimeException: Could not start JMX connector server
at org.apache.karaf.management.ConnectorServerFactory$1.run(ConnectorServerFactory.java:255)
Caused by: java.io.IOException: Cannot bind to URL [rmi://0.0.0.0:1099/karaf-root]: javax.naming.ConfigurationException [Root exception is java.rmi.UnknownHostException: Unknown host: 0.0.0.0; nested exception is:
java.net.UnknownHostException: kevins-mbp: kevins-mbp: nodename nor servname provided, or not known]
at javax.management.remote.rmi.RMIConnectorServer.newIOException(RMIConnectorServer.java:826)
at javax.management.remote.rmi.RMIConnectorServer.start(RMIConnectorServer.java:431)
at org.apache.karaf.management.ConnectorServerFactory$1.run(ConnectorServerFactory.java:242)
Caused by: javax.naming.ConfigurationException [Root exception is java.rmi.UnknownHostException: Unknown host: 0.0.0.0; nested exception is:
java.net.UnknownHostException: kevins-mbp: kevins-mbp: nodename nor servname provided, or not known]
at com.sun.jndi.rmi.registry.RegistryContext.bind(RegistryContext.java:143)
at com.sun.jndi.toolkit.url.GenericURLContext.bind(GenericURLContext.java:226)
at javax.naming.InitialContext.bind(InitialContext.java:419)
at javax.management.remote.rmi.RMIConnectorServer.bind(RMIConnectorServer.java:643)
at javax.management.remote.rmi.RMIConnectorServer.start(RMIConnectorServer.java:426)
... 1 more
Caused by: java.rmi.UnknownHostException: Unknown host: 0.0.0.0; nested exception is:
java.net.UnknownHostException: kevins-mbp: kevins-mbp: nodename nor servname provided, or not known
at sun.rmi.transport.tcp.TCPEndpoint.newSocket(TCPEndpoint.java:616)
at sun.rmi.transport.tcp.TCPChannel.createConnection(TCPChannel.java:216)
at sun.rmi.transport.tcp.TCPChannel.newConnection(TCPChannel.java:202)
at sun.rmi.server.UnicastRef.newCall(UnicastRef.java:341)
at sun.rmi.registry.RegistryImpl_Stub.bind(Unknown Source)
at com.sun.jndi.rmi.registry.RegistryContext.bind(RegistryContext.java:137)
... 5 more
Caused by: java.net.UnknownHostException: kevins-mbp: kevins-mbp: nodename nor servname provided, or not known
at java.net.InetAddress.getLocalHost(InetAddress.java:1473)
at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(AbstractPlainSocketImpl.java:198)
at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(AbstractPlainSocketImpl.java:182)
at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(SocksSocketImpl.java:392)
at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:579)
at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:528)
at java.net.Socket.<init>(Socket.java:425)
at java.net.Socket.<init>(Socket.java:208)
at sun.rmi.transport.proxy.RMIDirectSocketFactory.createSocket(RMIDirectSocketFactory.java:40)
at sun.rmi.transport.proxy.RMIMasterSocketFactory.createSocket(RMIMasterSocketFactory.java:147)
at sun.rmi.transport.tcp.TCPEndpoint.newSocket(TCPEndpoint.java:613)
... 10 more
Caused by: java.net.UnknownHostException: kevins-mbp: nodename nor servname provided, or not known
at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method)
at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(InetAddress.java:901)
at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressesFromNameService(InetAddress.java:1293)
at java.net.InetAddress.getLocalHost(InetAddress.java:1469)
... 20 more
100% [========================================================================]

_ ____ ______

  _ \ ____
    _) ___ ___ ___   __ _ _ ___ ___

  __     _) () _ __ \       _ __ \ __/

JBoss Fuse (6.1.0.redhat-311)
http://www.redhat.com/products/jbossenterprisemiddleware/fuse/

Hit '<tab>' for a list of available commands
and '[cmd] --help' for help on a specific command.

Hit '<ctrl-d>' or 'osgi:shutdown' to shutdown JBoss Fuse.

JBossFuse:karaf@root>
item.summary: Exception in thread "JMX Connector Thread" on startup of jboss-fuse-6.1.0.redhat-311

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Yea, that's the problem, thanks. I didn't have a problem with this before the upgrade to Mavericks.
